passage_text: From popular apps to emergency assistance, Uconnect ® Access is designed to keep you connected, entertained and focused on driving. The Advantage Package is available now at a new rate of $149.99 a year with over 15% savings. Uconnect Access is also available at the regular pricing of $14.99 a month.

Take a look at available Uconnect® Web by Mopar®, which turns your car into a mobile hotspot with WiFi connectivity. It provides complete access to email, websites and music, multiple device connectivity and a range of 150 feet from the vehicle.

WIFI. Take a look at available Uconnect ® Web by Mopar ® , which turns your car into a mobile hotspot with WiFi connectivity. It provides complete access to email, websites and music, multiple device connectivity and a range of 150 feet from the vehicle. *MSRP excludes destination, taxes, title and registration fees.

Uconnect ® Access puts everything you need within reach, from personalized entertainment to emergency services. All you need to do is push a button and voice your choice. A 6- or 12-month trial of the Uconnect ® Access Advantage Package is included with select new vehicle purchases or leases. Monthly subscriptions are also available.
